#text=I ride the bus almost every day , and yesterday was no exception .
#text=I was taking a trip to a donation center to drop off some items .
#text=Before I went out to the bus stop , I checked my phone for schedules and live info on where the bus is so I could spend the least amount of time waiting for the bus .
#text=Once it was time , I ran out to the bus stop with my wallet and my bus card - a pass containing all the fare money I use electronically .
#text=Once I was on the bus , I scanned my pass , looked for an open seat , and sat down .
#text=When my stop was nearby , I pulled a cord that made a signal on the bus to let the driver know I needed him to stop there .
#text=I gathered my belongings and got off the bus , using the rear exit so I do n't bump into anyone who might be boarding in front .
